price: Wͻde wͻn nsedie no ayε kyεm, enti wͻsi (amanfoͻ) kwan firi Nyankopͻn kwan no so. Enti wͻbɛnya animguaseε asotwee.
arabic: ٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ أَيۡمَٰنَهُمۡ جُنَّةٗ فَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ مُّهِينٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: ittakhadhū aymānahum junnatan faṣaddū ʿan sabīli al-lahi falahum ʿadhābun muhīnun
